ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:06:40 [Issue ID 4000-108504] urn:comicvine:4000-108504 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 16:20:56. [Issue ID 329594]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Events hurtle towards a deadly climax as the Durapasya are forced to attack the Darinde ahead of schedule in order to protect Amara Gaelle, and give her a chance to save the Source. A ferocious battle rages in the heart of Sitapur's largest slum, and thousands of innocent lives are at stake. This is a battle Tara wants no part in, but her hand is forced - Rahul's life is in deadly danger, and she is the only one who can save him.

ComicInfo.Title: Yudh
